title.rendered: Fashion Face-Off: Rihanna vs. Kourtney Kardashian

content.rendered:
Reading Time: < 1 minute

Rihanna and Kourtney Kardashian have very little in common.

While the singer is best known for her beauty, talent and famous boyfriend (Chris Brown), Kourtney has made a name for herself because her sister had intercourse on tape with Ray J.

Still, these two celebrities appear to have the same taste in fashion. They were caught on different red carpets recently, donning the same dress:

Who wears this outfit better?
